item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-02-07
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Green Tea (24 Elliot Street, Newton). #
  • Tried to import briankirsten.com to Posterous, it only imported last 1000 posts. It's a good start but why not let me import a file? #
  • I'm at Deluxe Town Diner (627 Mount Auburn Street, Watertown). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
